post:
Hi everyone,

Continuing on the success of our [LowEndBox offer](http://lowendbox.com/blog/quickpacket-49month-dual-xeon-l5420-16gb-ram-1tb-hard-drive-in-atlanta/), QuickPacket is pleased to offer our Dual Xeon L5520 server out of 470 E Paces Ferry Rd NE in Atlanta, GA. Please contact our sales department with any questions prior to ordering.

**Dell C6100 or SuperMicro Twin2 - Intel Dual Xeon L5520**

- Dual Quad Core 2.26 GHz / 2x 8 MB Cache
- 24 GB RAM
- 1 TB Serial ATA Hard Drive or 128 GB SSD
- 5 IPv4 Addresses on Private VLAN with Reverse DNS
- /64 IPv6 Addresses upon request, larger blocks with justification
- Dedicated KVM over IP / IPMI (uses 1 IP address)
- 20 TB Bandwidth / 1 Gbps Port
- Unmanaged
- Located in 470 E Paces Ferry Rd NE / Atlanta, GA

**$45 per month - [Click here to Order Now!](https://www.quickpacket.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=101&promocode=LETXEON45) (Coupon Code LETXEON45)**

- QuickPacket was founded in 2003 and is a registered LLC in North Carolina.
- Network providers include Hibernia, Cogent, GTT, Zayo, and peering (AS46261).
- Ping/traceroute to 199.101.96.3. Please contact us for a test file link.
- Warez-related, Bulk Mail, and Spam-related activities are strictly forbidden. Please review our Terms of Service prior to ordering.
- We accept PayPal, VISA, MasterCard, American Express, Discover, and Bitcoin (through BitPay) payments.
- Coupon code is mentioned above. The discounted price will be reflected on the second page of the order form.
- Promotional pricing is available for new customers or existing customers adding additional servers. Promotional offers cannot be combined with other promotional offers.

Thanks for your interest!
